desc: Enjoy a selection of new and unique reads from Firebird Spark, independent publishing house with an emphasis on diversity of idea and expression

layout.text: The Rebirth of a Phoenix is Out Now!

Have you ever wondered what is going on in the mind of someone who is coming into their own power? Who has to fight the uphill battle of a decline in mental health in the midst of an abusive relationship? Who had to find a way out and also find herself again? Who does all of this while learning what it truly means to be a Black woman in America? This collection is the story of a survivor who just wants to see herself rise from the ashes and fly again.
